package.name: Ebizmarts_MailChimp
package.summary: The Ebizmarts MailChimp module will help you to keep synchronized your Store data with your MailChimp account using their integration API.
package.description:
The current Ebizmarts MailChimp module has the following features supported:
* subscription / unsubscription / updating for Magento subscribers to a specific MailChimp list. * MailChimp WebHooks supported so you can keep full bidirectional synchronization and use the double opt-in option. * supports the use of several MailChimp lists shown to users as Additional Lists. * supports the use of Interest Groups. * allows the setup of several customer data to be sent to MailChimp lists as Merge fields. * allows to force subscription on either register and checkout pages. * allows you to send a batch of subscribers from Magento to MailChimp and vice versa in order to give the best performance to your synchronizations. * Ecommerce360 feature added. * STS feature added. * Campaign template edition support.
package.notes:
Release 3.1.6 --------------------- - Fix Sync problem
Release 3.1.4 --------------------- - Fix for 'API Key is not well formed.' with valid API keys
Release 3.1.3 --------------------- - Fix for 'An error occurred while saving your subscription, please try again later.' and some errors when it save a customer.
Release 3.1.2 --------------------- - New Store filter on bulk actions. - Fix for 'Get content from CMS Page' select box. - Fix on JS at WebHooks page. - Fix on the Aux collection by to avoid issues on some platforms with reserved names. - Help section updated. - WebHooks updated to be a Magento Controller.
Release 3.1.1 --------------------- - new Help Section added. - new 'date_of_purchase' merge field added. - fix for webhooks page on IE. - improved code at the STS page.
Release 3.1.0 --------------------- - added 'disabled success emails' option. - fix for 'Error: Request-URI Too Large Error' related to STS. - allow blank names on subscriptions. - removed the JS and CSS links for all pages. - added campaign template edition feature.
Release 3.0.4 --------------------- - fix for bug related to list names with commas. - fix for bug related on bulk page related to the security key. - fix for old Magento versions related the missing addFieldToSelect function. - fix for cart blank page issue when compilation is enabled, related to the ecomm360 feature. - performed webhookspage. - performed exceptions error logs. - performed grouping merge vars code. - added compatibility for customer attributes with source to be sent to MC (ie: gender).
Release 3.0.3 --------------------- -Removed all old Pro version files.
Release 3.0.2 --------------------- - STS feature added. - Admin synchro added on customer and newsletter pages. - FNAME and LNAME merge fields configurable for guests. - Fix for email changes. - FIx for resubscription when double opt-in enabled.
Release 3.0.1 --------------------- - New version adapted for FREE.
Release 2.2.1 --------------------- - New Grid table on Admin for Ecomm360 feature added.
Release 2.2.0 --------------------- - New Ecomm360 feature added.
Release 2.1.3 --------------------- - Updated to use API 1.3

Release 2.1.0 --------------------- - All reported frontend bugs fixed. - New Bulk Sync Feature added. - No more Serial Ids. - Headers sent to Mailchimp including Magento and module versions.
Release 2.0.2 --------------------- - Compatible with Magento Compiler - Fixes issues related to double opt-in.

Release 1.1.2 --------------------- - Groups added to General Newsletter. - New General Subscription w/ Groups added to customer/account/create/. - New miniNewsletter box added at checkout/cart/.
Release 1.1.1 --------------------- - Subscription mandatory for guest and new customers at checkout.
